languages.text: [Наклониться и прошептать Ирлиэт на ухо] "Страдания, говоришь? Хорошо. Покажи, сколько еще страданий ты готова вытерпеть ради возможного прощения".
[Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."
languages.original_text: [Наклониться и прошептать Ирлиэт на ухо] "Страдания, говоришь? Хорошо. Покажи, сколько еще страданий ты готова вытерпеть ради возможного прощения".

traits.locale_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are ready to suffer for a chance to be forgiven."

[Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."
[Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

languages.text: [朝伊莉耶特靠过去，在她耳边低语]“你是说痛苦吗？太棒了。让我看看，为了得到宽恕，你愿意忍受多少痛苦。”
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: [朝伊莉耶特靠过去，在她耳边低语]“你是说痛苦吗？太棒了。让我看看，为了得到宽恕，你愿意忍受多少痛苦。”

languages.text: [Dich zu Yrliet beugen und ihr ins Ohr flüstern] "Leid, sagt Ihr? Perfekt. Zeigt mir, wie sehr Ihr für die Chance auf Vergebung zu leiden bereit seid."
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: [Dich zu Yrliet beugen und ihr ins Ohr flüstern] "Leid, sagt Ihr? Perfekt. Zeigt mir, wie sehr Ihr für die Chance auf Vergebung zu leiden bereit seid."

languages.text: [Vous pencher vers Yrliet et lui murmurer à l'oreille] « Vous parlez de souffrance ? Parfait. Montrez-moi jusqu'à quel point vous êtes prête à souffrir pour vous faire pardonner. »
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: [Vous pencher vers Yrliet et lui murmurer à l'oreille] « Vous parlez de souffrance ? Parfait. Montrez-moi jusqu'à quel point vous êtes prête à souffrir pour vous faire pardonner. »

languages.text: [Inclinarte hacia Yrliet y susurrarle al oído] «¿Hablas de sufrimiento? Perfecto. Muéstrame cuánto estás dispuesta a sufrir para ganarte mi perdón».
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: [Inclinarte hacia Yrliet y susurrarle al oído] «¿Hablas de sufrimiento? Perfecto. Muéstrame cuánto estás dispuesta a sufrir para ganarte mi perdón».

languages.text: ［ユリエットの方に身を乗り出し、彼女の耳元でささやく］「苦しいと言ったか？よし。許しを請うチャンスを手にするのに、あとどれくらい苦しむ覚悟があるのか見せてもらおうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: ［ユリエットの方に身を乗り出し、彼女の耳元でささやく］「苦しいと言ったか？よし。許しを請うチャンスを手にするのに、あとどれくらい苦しむ覚悟があるのか見せてもらおうじゃないか」

languages.text: [Yrliet'e doğru eğilip kulağına fısılda] "Izdırap demek. Mükemmel. Göster bakalım, affedilme şansı bulmak için daha ne kadar ızdırap çekmeye razısın?"
languages.original_text: [Lean toward Yrliet and whisper in her ear] "Suffering, you say? Perfect. Show me how much more you are willing to suffer for a chance at forgiveness."
